p: Ten grams of each treatment were homogenized with 90 mL sterile saline for 2 min by a stomacher (Stomacher BW-400P, Turelab, Shanghai, China). Total count and mould and yeast count (MY) were enumerated on plate count agar and potato dextrose agar after incubation at 37 °C for 48 h and 28 °C for 5 d, respectively [ 31]. The results were expressed as log10 of colony-forming units per gram sample (CFU g −1).
